text.0:
The US presidential election may seem like a personality contest, but the election is actually indirect. 
We explain the #ElectoralCollege process to elect #POTUS

 #Elections2020

https://t.co/SiZFRHTMH8 via @boomlive_in
text.1:
#BOOMExplains: Is India's air filthy?
"The new State of Global Air Report states that particulate matter or #airpollution related deaths have gone up by 61% in India since 2010. It is a health emergency," says @AnumitaRoychowd of Centre For Science & Environment to @govindethiraj https://t.co/GOqe7V037B
text.2:
The post misrepresents incarceration statistics and also falsely states that #KamalaHarris released evidence after two Black men were executed. #FakeNews 

https://t.co/nY8xPdfAuO
text.3:
An image of an anti Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) protest in Kolkata where protesters raised slogans against PM Narendra Modi is viral claiming residents of Bihar are protesting before the elections. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #BiharElections2020 

https://t.co/x562I7j1WL
text.4:
Multiple Facebook posts shared hundreds of times claim that a person named Richard A. Rothschild filed a patent for novel coronavirus tests in 2015. The claim is false. #FakeNews #COVID19 #coronavirus 

https://t.co/PnJxrhfZOc
text.5:
The Income Tax Department on Saturday extended the deadline of filing individual #IncomeTaxReturns from November 30 to December 31. A few other categories of taxation returns have also been extended to January 31, 2021.

https://t.co/UyxrEmaeqG
text.6:
A claim posted on Twitter says that most deaths in the 1918 #influenza pandemic originated from bacterial pneumonia caused by #facemasks and that Dr Anthony Fauci, the US government's top expert in the fight against #COVID19, knew about it. This is false.

https://t.co/EbwRNTNhJs
text.7:
US voters elect their president and vice-president indirectly through a process called the #ElectoralCollege (EC), even through their presidential elections may seem like a directly elected personality race. Read what this is about here. #USElection2020 

https://t.co/p5syDND1Xd
text.8:
An image making the rounds on Facebook claims to show former US Secretary of State #HillaryClinton shaking hands with late al-Qaeda leader #OsamaBinLaden. This claim is false. #FakeNews 

https://t.co/0UNmG2IEHB
text.9:
A video of Democratic vice presidential candidate Kamala Harris waving from a platform is circulating in Facebook posts claiming that virtually nobody showed up to her recent rally in Florida. The video is misleading. #FakeNews #KamalaHarris #Florida

https://t.co/K7o0WtUfZ5
text.10:
US President #DonaldTrump has falsely claim that the US has the lowest number of carbon emissions in the world after withdrawing from the Paris Climate accord. @AnumitaRoychowd lays facts bare in this interview with @govindethiraj. #AirPollution 

https://t.co/T0ItpGLUAP
text.11:
The Health Ministry has hinted at using the UIP and Mission Indradhanush scheme as a possible route for vaccine distribution but has not shared its strategy so far. #BiharElections2020 #TamilNadu #MadhyaPradesh 

https://t.co/tigtU05yaj
text.12:
In India, long-term exposure to outdoor and household #airpollution contributed to over 1.67 million annual deaths, across all age groups, from stroke, heart attack, diabetes, lung cancer, chronic lung diseases and neonatal diseases in 2019. #India

https://t.co/bh6b5hDeE0
text.13:
An old video of a protest march against Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan has been revived on Facebook ahead of by-elections on 28 Assembly seats to be held in the state on November 3. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #MadhyaPradesh

https://t.co/h5x3bgcl5E
text.14:
The Gavi plan for #Covax vaccine will see nations immunizing healthcare & social workers followed by those above 65 & high-risk individuals. However, @kiranshaw says after frontline workers, teachers & younger people should be vaccinated against #COVID19.

https://t.co/QFhYoowhj1
text.15:
An image of a group welcoming refugees in Kent, UK is viral with claims that it shows Samuel Paty, a French teacher who was decapitated on October 16 for showing cartoons of the prophet Mohammed to his class. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #parisbeheading

https://t.co/1SQctZpyLA
text.16:
A photo showing a huge crowd of people gathered at a public rally is being shared falsely claiming that it is from Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath's election rally in Bihar. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #BiharElections2020 #YogiAdityanath

https://t.co/3EQRISYbdx
text.17:
This week, certain Indian media outlets along with social media handles spread misinformation about a civil war happening in Pakistan. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #CivilWarInKarachi

https://t.co/IC99MaSkVH
text.18:
Good morning, India. This is our top read today:
The 160-year-old IPC governing #rape in India is a hangover from the colonial-era laws. There have been several piecemeal amendments to the IPC, but it hasn't been reformed in any way. Read more here.

https://t.co/vAUksDNdBi
